revised_title: A Review of the Theory of Electric and Magnetic Waves in the Ionosphere and Magnetosphere
tldr: The article discusses the theory of electric and magnetic waves in the ionosphere and magnetosphere, focusing on electromagnetic and hydromagnetic waves in a cold magnetoplasma. It reviews the basis of the theory, the radio and hydromagnetic approximations, and the properties of the magnetoplasma, including the Alfven velocity. The article also covers the two-fluid magnetoplasma, the dielectric tensor, and the conductivity tensor.
